plot outline: Krishna is the rich small town brat who lives life his style. His life sees a turnaround when he meets Rukmini, a young girl who volunteers along with her father at an old age home that is owned by Krishna's family. Does their love story see a happily ever after?
title: Rukku
plot: A spoilt, self-centered guy meets a girl with a heart of gold and falls in love soon he realises that life is all about caring for others.

Krishna is the rich small town brat who lives life his style. His life sees a turnaround when he meets Rukmini, a young girl who volunteers along with her father at an old age home that is owned by Krishna's family. Does their love story see a happily ever after?::sukanya suresh
